m_szDocTitle: Entire floor space for 2016 motor show sold out: SIAM - The Economic Times
m_szDocSumamry: Entire floor space for 2016 motor show sold out: SIAM By IANS | Jul 16, 2015, 09.05 AM IST ET SPECIAL: Love visual aspect of news? Enjoy this exclusive slideshows treat! NEW DELHI: The Society for Indian Automobile Manufactures (SIAM) on Wednesday evening said the entire floor space for the upcoming motor show in February next year has been sold out. Considered as the largest automotive event in the country, it is jointly organised by the Automotive Component Manufacturers Association of India, Confederation of Indian Industry and SIAM .
